channel.title: 巷子-影子
channel.description: Recent content on 巷子-影子

item.title: ubuntu install MS fonts
item.description: 简单记录下安装 Linux 后希望将 windows 字体安装如何实现 安装 ttf-mscorefonts-installer 1 2 3 sudo apt update sudo apt install ttf-mscorefonts-installer // 提示同意用户协议 sudo fc-cache -f -v //更新字体缓存 创建/usr/share/fo

item.title: doom emacs (1)
item.description: doom eamcs 是一个 Emacs 的配置框架，启动速度非常高效。按键使用了*spacemacs*风格。 准备使用它，首先安装它并基本配置它 安装 1 2 git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/hlissner/doom-emacs ~/.emacs.d ~/.emacs.d/bin/doom install doom

item.title: EMACS(一)
item.description: Emacs All posts in here will have the category set to emacs. TODOWriting Hugo blog in Org First heading within the post This post will be exported as content/posts/writing-hugo-blog-in-org-subtree-export.md. Its title will be “Writing Hugo blog in Org”. It will have hugo and org tags and emacs as category. The menu item weight and post weight are auto-calculated. The menu item identifier is auto-set. The lastmod property in the front-matter
